Text: Thanks, nice, I think dad will be happy for this one:P is this a remix of the Love album?

Sorry, in the haste and confusion of uploading my first torrent, I accidentally left out one track, which can be found at
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3683940/The_Beatles_-_I_Want_You_(missing_19th_track_from_The_Beatles_-_

This torrent plays OK without the missing 19th track but it sounds better with it - it goes after A Day in the Life and before Here Comes the Sun.

And, yes, it this torrent is a remix of the Love album.
It's incredible but who made the remix ?

Having trouble burning this. Anyone have advise on what software will allow the burning of m4a's? I've tried several, some claiming to  do it. Are these protected by Apple? Know of a work around? 

Thanks.
